title: GOgroove SonaVERSE USB Clip On Soundbar Laptop Speaker w/ USB Plug-n-Play for Amplified Sound - works w/ Toshiba , Asus , Mac , Macbook Pro , HP , Samsung , Acer , Dell , Sony , Lenovo Laptops & More
description: b>GOgroove SonaVERSE USB - A User-Friendly Speaker Solution!Powerful & PortableThis sleek USB speaker is perfect for the person on the go! It's light and easily fits in backpacks, purses, and more so it can go anywhere you do. The SonaVERSE USB has 2 high-excursion drivers, so it's an instant sound boost for your computer. If you're looking to improve your laptop's smaller, built-in speakers, this is the ideal choice!Versatile DesignThe clip-on mount can attach directly to your laptop screen. Padded grips prevent any scratching & ensure the speaker stays put. It will clip on to any surface with edges that are 1/2" thick or less, so you can clip it to desks, screens, and more! The compact, stylish design compliments any computer without adding bulk.Easy To UseThe Plug-N-Play design sends power & audio through a single USB cord. Simply plug it in to an open USB port and you're ready to go. Both the clip and stand are removable so you can customize the speaker's setup to your liking.TECH SPECSSpeaker output power: (1W x 2) 2W RMSDrivers: 1 in (2 drivers)Impedance: 4 OhmsFrequency Response: 100Hz - 20KHzInput Power: Standard USB DC 5VDimensions: 8.5 x 2.25 x 2 inchesUSB cable length: 3 ftWeight: 8.18 oz.WORKS WITH:AppleMacbook Pro , Air , iMacGoogleChromebook , PixelToshibaSatellite , Portege , KIRAbookASUSRepublic of Gamers , Transformer Book , Eee PC , VivoBook , Taichi , Zenbook PrimeHPUltrabook , Envy , Spectre , ProBook , Pavilion , Chromebook , SleekbookLenovoIdeaPad , IdeaPad Yoga 11 & 13 , ThinkPad TwistSamsungSeries 3 , 5 , 7 , 9 , ATIV Smart PC 500T , ATIV Book 6 & 5AcerAspire One , C7 Chromebook , AC700 , Aspire TimelineXDellInspiron , Mini , D600 , D620 , XPS , Latitude , PrecisionSonyVAIO C , E , F , L , S , Z , Y , T SeriesAnd more
